Package Controller

Class ProjectDB

java.lang.Object
Controller.Database
Controller.ProjectDB
public class ProjectDB extends Database
Represents a Database of Projects in the FYP Management System.
Since:
2023-04-14
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lab A34 Assignment Team 1

      public void setSupervisorProjectsToNewStatus(Supervisor currentSupervisor, ProjectStatus newStatus)
      Sets status of remaining projects of Supervisor to either AVAILABLE or UNAVILABLE. Used when student deregisters from a project or when project is transferred to another supervisor.

      newStatus -
